attributes.action: Stop all benefits apart from the nhs to all people who where not born in this country.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: any person who comes to this country via the open boarders of the eu cannot claim benefits. anyone who has been convicted of a crime cannot claim benefits for the first 5 years after their sentance has finnished. any person here claiming asylem cant claim benefits.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
